entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
